attributes.action: make state schools have after school clubs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many state schools have the only facilities in an area to carry out sports (playing fields, long jumps etc) or other such clubs (Chess, debating societies). State schools should have to run a miniumum number of after school clubs, and allow their facilities to be used by individuals at certain times within the week.
